original_text: My people hath been lost sheep: their shepherds have caused them to go astray, they have turned them away on the mountains: they have gone from mountain to hill, they have forgotten their restingplace.
korean_text: 내 백성은 잃어 버린 양 떼로다 그 목자들이 그들을 곁길로 가게 하여 산으로 돌이키게 하였으므로 그들이 산에서 언덕으로 돌아다니며 쉴 곳을 잊었도다

sentences.original_text: My people hath been lost sheep:
sentences.korean_translation: 내 백성은 길 잃은 양이 되었으니

sentences.original_text: their shepherds have caused them to go astray,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 목자들이 그들을 길 잃게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: they have turned them away on the mountains:
they have gone from mountain to hill,
